Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Class that manages the players' game objects.

    • getCoins

      public int getCoins()
      Gets the amount of coins the player has.
      Returns:
      the amount of coins owned by the player.

    • incrementCoins

      public void incrementCoins()
      Increments the coins by one unit.

    • decrementCoins

      public void decrementCoins(int cost) throws NotEnoughCoinException
      Decrements the player's coins by cost if the player has enough coins, otherwise throws NotEnoughCoinException.
      Parameters:
      cost - the cost of the purchase.
      Throws:
      NotEnoughCoinException - if the player cannot make the purchase.

    • getWizard

      public Wizard getWizard() throws WizardNotSetException
      Gets the wizard selected by the player if available, otherwise throws a WizardNotSetException.
      Returns:
      the wizard selected by the player.
      Throws:
      WizardNotSetException - if no wizard is available.

    • setWizard

      public void setWizard(Wizard wizard)
      Sets the wizard selected by the player.
      Parameters:
      wizard - the wizard selected by the player.

    • hasWizard

      public boolean hasWizard()
      Returns:
      true if the Player has a Wizard; otherwise false

    • getActiveAssistantCard

      public AssistantCard getActiveAssistantCard() throws AssistantCardNotSetException
      Gets the active assistant card, which is the assistant card played by the player in the current round. If no assistant card is available, throws AssistantCardNotSetException.
      Returns:
      the assistant card played by the player in the current round.
      Throws:
      AssistantCardNotSetException - if no assistant card is available.

    • setActiveAssistantCard

      public void setActiveAssistantCard(int assistantCardId) throws NoSuchElementException
      Sets the assistant card played by the player in the current round and removes it from the list of assistant cards contained in the player's wizard. Throws NoSuchElementException if the required card could not be found.
      Parameters:
      assistantCardId - the identifier of the card the player has played in the current round
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the required assistant card could not be found

    • popActiveAssistantCard

      public AssistantCard popActiveAssistantCard()
      Returns the active assistant card and sets the active assistant card to null.
      Returns:
      the active assistant card

    • getLastPlayedAssistantCard

      public AssistantCard getLastPlayedAssistantCard() throws AssistantCardNotSetException
      Gets the assistant card the player played in the previous round. If no assistant card is available, throws AssistantCardNotSetException.
      Returns:
      the assistant card played by the player in the previous round.
      Throws:
      AssistantCardNotSetException - if no assistant card is available.

    • setLastPlayedAssistantCard

      public void setLastPlayedAssistantCard(AssistantCard card)
      Sets the assistant card played by the player in the previous round.
      Parameters:
      card - the card the player played in the previous round.

    • getSchoolBoard

      public SchoolBoard getSchoolBoard() throws SchoolBoardNotSetException
      Gets the school board of the player. If no school board is present, throws SchoolBoardNotSetException.
      Returns:
      the school board of the player.
      Throws:
      SchoolBoardNotSetException - if no school board is availbale.

    • setSchoolBoard

      public void setSchoolBoard(SchoolBoard schoolBoard)
      Sets the school board of the player.
      Parameters:
      schoolBoard - the school board of the player.
